answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
I can send you a replacement DVD if you like, no problem. Also, to save money on the project, we switched to streaming just after Peter Block was filmed (the third in the series). You can watch all of the Leading Ideas Series videos online at http://icma.org/leadingideas. If you're interested in design, you'll also want to watch the interview with Tim Brown.
We've filmed about one a year, starting with Jim Collins.

author: John Perry
text: I believe that ICMA did a training session and marketed a related video about 2006 featuring Daniel Pink's thoughts about the changing role of managers, including increasing role of design and orchestrating folks in the community.  I'm trying to find a copy of that cd/video.   Any help is appreciated.   Thanks,  John
title: Daniel Pink/ICMA cd circa 2006
